content: in next chain-2 space chain 1 around join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-3 finish off 32 double_crochet 8 chain-2 8 chain-1 round 5 join nc with single_crochet to any chain-1 space shell in next chain-2 space single_crochet in next chain-1 space shell in next chain-2 space around join with slip_stitch to beg single_crochet finish off 8 shells 8 single_crochet round 6 join nc with single_crochet to 4th double_crochet of any shell chain 2 double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet in next single_crochet chain 2 single_crochet in 4th double_crochet of next shell around omitting last single_crochet join with slip_stitch to beg single_crochet 16 double_crochet 8 single_crochet 24 chain-2 round 7 chain 1 single_crochet in same and each st around 2 single_crochet in each chain-2 space join with slip_stitch to beg single_crochet finish off 72 single_crochet round 8 join nc with single_crochet to any single_crochet above a round 6 single_crochet single_crochet in next 4 sts half_double_crochet in next 3 sts double_crochet in next 3 sts 2 treble_crochet chain 2 2 treble_crochet in next st double_crochet in next 3 sts half_double_crochet in next 3 sts single_crochet in next 5 sts around omitting last 5 single_crochet join with slip_stitch to beg single_crochet 21 sts per side round 9 chain 1 single_crochet in same and each st around single_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet in each chain-2 space join with slip_stitch to beg single_crochet finish off 23 single_crochet per side 4 half_double_crochet © 2018 melinda miller all rights reserved more v s please copyright -
